Class ReservationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReservationList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReservationList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stores the list of reservation.

      • getReservationList

        public java.util.List<Reservation> getReservationList()

      • addReservation

        public void addReservation(java.util.Date reservationDate,
                           int numberOfPax,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String contactNumber,
                           int tableID,
                           TablesList tablesList)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a new reservation to the list.
        Parameters:
        reservationDate - The date when the reservation is made.
        numberOfPax - Number of Pax for this reservation.
        name - The person name who made this reservation.
        contactNumber - The contact number of the person who made the reservation.
        tableID - The id of the reserved tableID.
        tablesList - The class which stores all the tables list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getReservation

        public Reservation getReservation(java.util.Date date,
                                  java.lang.String contactNumber)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a certain reservation from date and contact number.
        Parameters:
        date - The date when the reservation is made.
        contactNumber - The contact number of person who made the reservation.
        Returns:
        The required reservation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkReservation

        public void checkReservation(java.lang.String contactNumber)
        Print the status of the reservation from a certain person.
        Parameters:
        contactNumber - The contact number of the person who made the reservation.

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation(java.util.Date date,
                              java.lang.String contactNumber,
                              TablesList tablesList)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove a reservation from the list. Reservation is uniquely identified by date and contact number.
        Parameters:
        date - The date when the reservation is made.
        contactNumber - The contactNumber of the person who made the reservation.
        tablesList - The class which contains all tables list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeExpiredReservation

        public void removeExpiredReservation(java.util.Date date)
        Remove a reservation when it is expired. A reservation is expired if the person has not come after 30 minutes from the reserved date.
        Parameters:
        date - Current date.
